title: Walnut Brown Solid Stretchable Premium Cotton Waistcoat
story_description:
Story Are you a fashion-conscious gentleman searching for a versatile and sophisticated Waistcoat?
Look no further than our Walnut Brown Solid Premium Cotton Waistcoat. Crafted with meticulous
attention to detail and made from high-quality cotton fabric, this Waistcoat is a perfect blend of
elegance and comfort. The walnut brown color exudes timeless charm, offering a rich and distinctive
look that sets you apart from the crowd. Whether you're attending a formal event, a business
meeting, or a special occasion, this Waistcoat is a versatile choice that effortlessly combines
classic style with contemporary flair. Our premium cotton fabric ensures a luxurious feel against
your skin, providing maximum comfort throughout the day. The breathable nature of cotton makes it
ideal for various climates, keeping you cool and confident even during warmer seasons.

title: Jade Black Diamond Nehru Jacket
story_description:
Story This Diamond textured weave, uses two pale and two dark threads to create a small repeating
shape reminiscent of a diamond. This kind of precise weave is best handled by masters of the craft,
which is why this fabric is made by the Italian mill.This Blue Waistcoat stands out for its distinct
blue and the surface interest created by its diamond weave. The combination makes for a tastefully
strong Waistcoat. We like diamond weave for its textured look, but you’ll love its luxuriant feel.

title: Space Blue Mandarin Nehru Jacket
story_description:
Story Revel in the thought that with this performance Waistcoat in hand, your main concern won’t be
the discomfort of your stuffy Waistcoat, but rather if the airplane has WiFi, or how close that baby
is going to be to your row. The specially woven terry rayon fabric makes this space blue Waistcoat
more wrinkle-resistant, stain-resistant, and gives it a slight stretch quality for increased
comfort, all without compromising breathability to keep you looking, feeling, and smelling your best
when you’re on the road.

title: Jade Black Designer Waistcoat
story_description:
Story Our most luxurious Giza Cotton, and this one is as good as it gets. Made with ultra-premium
certified West Indian Sea Island Cotton from Barbados, it has the perfect combination of durability,
super soft handful, vibrant Print, and silky luster. This Waistcoat offers our signature quality and
tailoring at an excellent value. Crafted of Giza cotton in italy, and sold as fully finished
separates to make it easier to find your perfect fit. Two-button silhouette, notched lapels with
pick-stitched detailing, Black buttons, finished sleeve cuffs, besom chest pocket, convertible
flap-welt waist pockets, Side vents. Fully lined interior features our signature piping and two
interior pockets.Regent Fit:Our best-seller.The perfect fit for just about everybody;fitted at the
chest, shoulders and waist.

title: Zeus Gray Plaid Waistcoat
story_description:
Story In addition to being constructed from Imported Superior Fabrics, French crown Waistcoats are
built with top quality components and thoughtful construction. Terry Rayon Fabric: Terry Rayon is a
premium-grade fabric that’s made of rayon and polyester fibers. Terry Rayon looks like and feels
like wool, featuring a soft and supple texture that resembles its counterpart. Don’t let that fool
you into thinking Terry Rayon is nothing more than wool, however. On the contrary, while it looks
and feels like wool, it’s actually stronger and more durable. So choosing a Terry Rayon Trouser
means you get the best of both worlds: it’s strong yet still super soft and comfortable at the same
time. Terry Rayon is a high-quality, luxurious fabric that’s not found in your typical retail
department store. In fact, it’s so rare that only a select few stores carry them, including French
Crown. Features Semi Padded shoulder for a formal silhouette 5-button, Single-breasted closure Patch
Pockets Half-canvas construction Pattern: plaid Limited quantity, Seasonal collection. We change our
fashion very frequently. Grab it before it disappears. Medium to Heavy weight fabric. Made for all
climates.
description:
In addition to being constructed from Imported Superior Fabrics, French crown Waistcoats are built
with top quality components and thoughtful construction.Terry Rayon Fabric: Terry Rayon is a
premium-grade fabric that’s made of rayon and polyester fibers. Terry Rayon looks like and feels
like wool, featuring a soft and supple texture that resembles its counterpart. Don’t let that fool
you into thinking Terry Rayon is nothing more than wool, however. On the contrary, while it looks
and feels like wool, it’s actually stronger and more durable. So choosing a Terry Rayon Trouser
means you get the best of both worlds: it’s strong yet still super soft and comfortable at the same
time. Terry Rayon is a high-quality, luxurious fabric that’s not found in your typical retail
department store. In fact, it’s so rare that only a select few stores carry them, including French
Crown.FeaturesSemi Padded shoulder for a formal silhouette5-button, Single-breasted closurePatch
PocketsHalf-canvas constructionPattern: plaidLimited quantity, Seasonal collection. We change our
fashion very frequently. Grab it before it disappears.Medium to Heavy weight fabric. Made for all

Story When it comes to checks the possibilities are practically endless, which means there’s no
shortage of opportunities to wear them. French crown’a smart checked jacket is a contemporary take
on classic Waistcoating. Regular fit with two vents and added stretch for effortless all-day wear.
Smart regular cut, with peak lapels and a double-breasted, six-button fastening that won't fall off.
Matching polyester lining and trim. Boasting of a single inside and three outer pockets. Lightweight
and breathable, this brown mix checked jacket is perfect for any summer weather event.

title: Black and White Houndstooth Windowpane Wool Rich Waistcoat

taper slightly through the arms and legs while highlighting the shoulders and chest. Complement the
Houndstooth with a shirt or tie featuring a larger subtle pattern and add a pocket square for formal
occasions.
